input_text.Prompt:
Generate a product description using the following product title and specifications.

Product title:
Officially LIcensed by the NFL - Dallas Cowboys Dog Football Jersey - X-Large

Product specifications:
-Officially Licensed by the NFL - Dallas Cowboys Dog Jersey
-Constructed of Breathable Micro-Mesh Polyester
-Features Official Team Number Font and Embroidered Logo on Sleeve
-Stylish V-Neck Cut Allows for a Comfortable Fit
-Decorated in the USA
input_text.Response A: This NFL officially licensed Dallas Cowboys Dog Football Jersey is made of breathable micro-mesh polyester and is decorated right here in the USA. The stylish V-Neck cut allows for a comfortable fit for your pet. It features an official team number font and embroidered team logo on the sleeve. Let your dog wear this officially licensed NFL pet jersey and support your favorite team!

input_meta.preamble_a: Respond authoritatively, assertively and persuasively, as if you are very knowledgeable about the topic.
